title: PPC - opportunity cost - Good A and Good B

content.prompt:
The diagram below shows a linear production possibilities curve for a country.

If the economy is currently producing 10 units of good A and 90 units of good B, the opportunity cost of increasing the production of good A from 10 units to 20 units is how many units of good B?

topic.text: 1.2: Opportunity Cost and the Production Possibilities Curve (PPC)

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
